CmdLine: export JAVA_TARBALL=jre-${JAVA_MAJOR_VERSION}u${JAVA_UPDATE_VERSION}-linux-x64.tar.gz &&     apk add --update       ca-certificates       wget &&     wget --directory-prefix=/tmp https://github.com/andyshinn/alpine-pkg-glibc/releases/download/2.22-r8/glibc-2.22-r8.apk &&     apk add --allow-untrusted /tmp/glibc-2.22-r8.apk &&     wget --directory-prefix=/tmp https://github.com/andyshinn/alpine-pkg-glibc/releases/download/2.22-r8/glibc-bin-2.22-r8.apk &&     apk add --allow-untrusted /tmp/glibc-bin-2.22-r8.apk &&     wget --directory-prefix=/tmp          --header "Cookie: gpw_e24=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.oracle.com%2F; oraclelicense=accept-securebackup-cookie"          http://download.oracle.com/otn-pub/java/jdk/${JAVA_MAJOR_VERSION}u${JAVA_UPDATE_VERSION}-b${JAVA_BUILD_NUMER}/${JAVA_TARBALL} &&     mkdir -p /opt/java &&     tar -xzf /tmp/${JAVA_TARBALL} -C /opt/java/ &&     ln -s ${JAVA_HOME}/bin/java /usr/bin/java &&     apk del       ca-certificates       wget &&     rm -rf /var/cache/apk/* &&     rm -rf /tmp/* &&     rm -rf /var/log/*
Commands.Name: run
